body.content: When a group project for a MBA class required a development of an initiative with real-world applications, group mate, technologist and VetsWhoCode board member Brian Holt approached his team (affectionately known as 'Team Lilac Popcorn') with an idea to develop something for this tech nonprofit. After hours of interviews with veterans who've gone through the program, other businesses along with expertise that the team brought from their own professional careers, the VetsWhoCode hiring partnership program was born.
Learn from the team about how they went about developing this latest initiative for VetsWhoCode and what they learned along the way.

Team members Brian Holt, Stacey Jimenez, Andreas Kammereck, and Colleen Turner are all leaders in their respective fields. They are all currently pursuing their MBA at Seattle University. They are all passionate about helping veterans and are excited to share their experience with you.
